definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be empty(?), clean (Sir 16:11 Niph. Impf. [[ינקה]] be unpunished, so Sir 40:15, Sir 31:5 = Pr 28:20; NH Pi. = BH; Aram. [[נְקָא]] Pa. = BH, adj. [[נְקֵא]] clean; Ph. [[נקי]] adj. pure; Palm. [[נקא]] be clean (perh.) in n.pr. Sachau:ZMG xxxv (1881), 735 Lzb:325; As. nâkû, pour out, pour libation, make offering, nikû, libation, offering; OAram. [[נקיה]] perhaps = [[נוּקָיָה]] libation (Lzb:326), cf. Syr. nuwqyo0 Cook:83; Syr. naqiy Pa. pour out, make a libation; on the other hand, Ar. naqiya purus, mundus fuit Kam Frey; II. cleanse, etc., Lane:3037 .—Orig. meaning prob.empty out, hence pour and be empty, clean);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[נׇקׂה]] Je 49:12 ([[נׇקׂה תִּנׇּקֶה]], prob. error for ´[[הנקה ת]], cf. Je 25:29).
be cleaned out, of a plundered city Is 3:26; purged out, of liars and perjurers Zec 5:3, Zec 5:3.
be clean, free from guilt, innocent, Je 2:35 c. [[מִן]], [[מִפֶּשַׁע]] Ps 19:14; [[מֵעָוֹן]] Nu 5:31(P); [[מִפְּלִשְׁתִּים]] from (at the hands of) the Philistines Ju Jdg 15:3.

be free, exempt from punishment, abs. Ex 21:19 (E) Nu 5:28 (P) 1Sa 26:9; [[לאׂ יִנׇּקֶה]] Pr 6:29, Pr 11:21, Pr 16:5, Pr 17:5, Pr 19:5, Pr 19:9, Pr 28:20, Je 25:29, Je 25:29, Je 25:29, Je 49:12 b, [[נׇקׂה תִּנׇּקֶה]] v:Je 49:12 a.
free, exempt from obligation, c. [[מִן]], from oaths Ge 24:8, Ge 24:41 (J); [[מִמֵּי הַמָּרִים]] from effects of drinking the bitter water Nu 51:19 (P).
. hold innocent, acquit, Job 9:28; [[מֵעֲוֹנִי]] Job 10:4; [[מִנִּסְתּרוֹת]] Ps 19:13.

leave unpunished: of man, c. acc. 1Ki 2:9; elsewhere of God: abs. [[נַקֵּה לאׂ יְנַקֶּה]] Ex 34:7, Ex 34:7 = Nu 14:18, Nu 14:18 (all J) = Na 1:3, Na 1:3; c. acc. [[לאׂ יְנַקֶּה]] Ex 20:7 = De 5:11; [[נַקֵּה לאׂ אֲנַקֶָּ֑]] Je 30:11, Je 30:11 = Je 46:28, Je 46:28, cf. Joe 3:21, Joe 3:21 (but v. supr.).
